hide-discount: Hide discount information from cart page
hide-discount-disclaimer: Not recommended unless you know what you're doing
display-product-h: Display the product which was added to cart, to the top of the list.
top-p-badge: Top Product Badge - In Your Cart
top-p-badge-h: Text next to the validated badge
title-h: Title that appears on the top of the pop-up window.
add-to-cart-h: Label to add upsell product to cart.
added-to-cart-h: Appears when an upsell product is added to cart.
btn-nothx-h: Text that appears on the bottom button if the customer doesn't select any upsell.
btn-continue-price: Show/hide upsell price in the 'Continue' button
btn-continue-h: Text that appears on the button after the customer has selected one or multiple upsells.
discount-h: Appear in cart when a discount is applied
one-time-per-session: Open the modal just one time per session
selected-per-default: Auto select all upsell by default
only-on-pages: Open the modal only on some pages
aaa-p: Used by Apple, Google, Easy Jet
ccc-p: Used by Tesla, Ryanair, Travel Uniform, Pro Flowers, Huel, Warby Parker
ddd-p: Used by Dollar Shave Club, Casper, Purple Mattress
free-shipping-bar-text-progress-label: Text on the bar during progress
free-shipping-bar-text-sucess-label: Text on the bar after success
free-shipping-bar-text-progress-placehol: ADD {AMOUNT} MORE TO GET FREE SHIPPING
limit-quantity-field-label: Max. number of items customer can select
limit-quantity-option-empty-state: Select products or collections there upsell should limit the number of products customer is able to choose
